Package AdventureModel

Class AdventureGame

java.lang.Object
AdventureModel.AdventureGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class AdventureGame extends Object implements Serializable
Class AdventureGame. Handles all the necessary tasks to run the Adventure game.
See Also:

    • setUpGame

      public void setUpGame() throws IOException
      Uses an AdventureLoader to load all necessary data from game files and set up the AdventureGame model
      Throws:
      IOException - in the case of a file I/O error

    • tokenize

      public String[] tokenize(String input)
      Tokenizes the input string and returns a string array of tokens that represents the command.
      Parameters:
      input - string from the command line
      Returns:
      a string array of tokens that represents the command.

    • movePlayer

      public boolean movePlayer(String direction)
      Moves the player in the given direction, if possible. Return false if the player wins or dies as a result of the move.
      Parameters:
      direction - the move command
      Returns:
      false, if move results in death or a win (and game is over). Else, true.

    • trollEncounter

      public Troll trollEncounter()
      Chooses a troll to "encounter" randomly
      Returns:
      the troll that was chosen

      public String interpretAction(String command)
      Interprets the user's action.
      Parameters:
      command - String representation of the command.
      Returns:
      null if nothing is special or a specific string output to display to the user
